Class HttpURLConnectionClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atlan.net.HttpClient
      • com.atlan.net.HttpURLConnectionClient
  • public class HttpURLConnectionClient
extends HttpClient
    Class that actually handles the HTTP-level communications with Atlan.
